config.nbtvoid.title: Configure NBT Void
config.nbtvoid.isEnabledTooltip: If disabled, void will not save any items
config.nbtvoid.reducedSourcesTooltip: Only check items in inventories and equipment
config.nbtvoid.maxDisplayItemsTooltip: Maximum amount of rows (9 items) void tab will display
config.nbtvoid.maxStoredItemsTooltip: Maximum amount of rows (9 items) void will store
config.nbtvoid.defaultSearchQueryTooltip: Default search query in the void tab
config.nbtvoid.nameCheckTooltip: Search type for occurrence of name queries
config.nbtvoid.nbtCheckTooltip: Search type for occurrence of NBT queries
config.nbtvoid.ignoreNbtTooltip: NBTs that will be ignored when checking does item have NBT
config.nbtvoid.removeNbtTooltip: NBTs that will be removed when adding to void
config.nbtvoid.doDynamicUpdateTooltip: Update void after saving to match current configuration
